Input.title: Input Parameters
Input.description: Mandatory Parameters to start the resquiggle analysis

bam_files.title: Binary Alignment Map Directory (.bam files)
bam_files.description: Input directory containing .bam files for the description

kmer_lvl_table.title: KMER-level table file
kmer_lvl_table.description: should be RNA004 or RNA002 and link to a hardcode path to the ONT website https://github.com/nanoporetech/kmer_models

outdir.title: Save Path
outdir.description: This is the directory where the output gets saved

modified_data.title: Modified Data
modified_data.description: Do the reads contain modified bases or not?

use_modified_region.title: Use Modified Region
use_modified_region.description: Will create chunks around modification position

mod_dict.title: Modification Dictionary
mod_dict.description: A dictionary with the modification information, alternative basenames for modified bases with default: M=m6A, G=Gm, I=Inosine, P=Pseudouridine

mod_type.title: Modification Type
mod_type.description: Choose a key according to the modification dictionary indicating your modification type

mod_pos.title: Location of Modification
mod_pos.description: Position of the modification in the reference sequence

bases_before_mod.title: Number of Bases before Modification
bases_before_mod.description: If you want you can take more bases to the left or right from your modification position

Segmentation_Params.title: Segmentation Parameters
Segmentation_Params.description: Advanced parameteres related to data segmentation

batch_size.title: Batch size
batch_size.description: Number of chunks saved per file

max_seq_length.title: Maximum sequence length
max_seq_length.description: Maximum number of base that a chunk can have

chunk_length.title: Number of chunks
chunk_length.description: Defines how many timepoints to inlude within a sliding window

time_shift.title: Time shift
time_shift.description: How many timepoint to shift your sliding window to create a new represntation of the modification chunk

start_read_num.title: To update
start_read_num.description: Select the start entry from the .bam file

end_read_num.title: To update
end_read_num.description: Select the end entry from the .bam file
